'''Echoes''' are cosmetic [[sprinting]] trailing effects for [[Character]]s. They are obtained by completing [[Envisaged Echo]]es challenges accessed from the [[Imaginarium Theater]] Theater Lobby.

They can be equipped on the designated character from the [[Dressing Room]].
